title: AI Tools Directory - Free AI Tools Catalog
heroTitle: Discover Free AI Tools for All Your Needs
heroSubtitle: Explore a catalog of free AI tools for productivity, creativity, and more.
aboutText1: AI Tools Directory is a platform dedicated to helping individuals and professionals discover the best free AI tools to boost productivity, creativity, and efficiency. Founded in 2025, our mission is to democratize access to AI technology by providing a well-curated and accessible catalog.
aboutText2: Our team consists of technology enthusiasts and AI professionals who work to ensure every listed tool is verified for authenticity and usability. We also provide updates on AI trends and tool updates through our blog (coming soon!).
aboutText3: Contact us for inquiries, suggestions, or collaboration opportunities via our contact page or directly at vin.nesia.id@gmail.com.
privacyIntro: We at AI Tools Directory are committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information.
dataCollectionText: We only collect personal data you provide through the contact form, such as name, email, and message. This data is stored securely in our database and used solely to respond to your inquiries or suggestions.
cookiesText: We use cookies to store user preferences, such as dark/light theme and search history. You can disable cookies in your browser settings, but this may affect your user experience.
dataSecurityText: Contact form data is stored in MongoDB Atlas with encryption. We delete data that is no longer needed after 6 months, unless requested for earlier deletion.
policyChangesText: We may update this policy at any time. Changes will be published on this page, and you are encouraged to review it periodically.
contactForPrivacy: For data deletion requests, contact us at vin.nesia.id@gmail.com.
termsIntro: By using AI Tools Directory, you agree to comply with the following terms and conditions:
siteUsageText: This site provides information about free AI tools for personal and non-commercial use. You are prohibited from copying, distributing, or using content for commercial purposes without our written permission.
externalLinksText: We provide links to external sites for your convenience. We are not responsible for the content, services, or policies of those sites.
dataUsageText: Data collected through the contact form is used solely to respond to your inquiries. We do not share your data with third parties without your consent.
termsChangesText: We may update these terms at any time. Changes will be published on this page, and continued use of the site after updates constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
contactForTerms: For questions about these terms, contact us at vin.nesia.id@gmail.com.
contactIntro: Contact us for inquiries, suggestions, or collaboration opportunities:
